text: my name is Sanka Carriker I'm the senior
vice president for fleet and insurance
at notto
we are focused on building the data
platform to help make mobility safer for
current fleets and autonomous vehicles
in the future the NADA system is based
on a device that goes into the vehicle
we've got two cameras one that's
externally facing and one that's
internally facing what this device is
doing is in real time assessing context
of the vehicle what's in front of you
are there another vehicle is there
pedestrians what speed you're going are
there are the risk elements and then the
internal cameras is assessing the driver
in the passenger particularly for the
driver it's understanding if the driver
is distracted so one of the key things
that we see collisions and casualties
that are happening about 70% of them are
caused by driver distraction and so what
we're able to do is process real-time if
the driver is distracted and then we can
provide that information to a
cloud-based software system we offer our
fleet management that allows them the
fleet to understand the level of risk
for those drivers the device in addition
to distraction assess s-- what we call
ABCs acceleration braking and cornering
and collision and so though all those
events get uploaded into the cloud and
then we also bring a 30-second clip 20
seconds before in 10 seconds after
associated any of those events all that
information per driver goes shows up in
the fleet management system which the
fleet owner can actually look at and
then we have a score we call Vera
visually enhance risk assessment which
helps that fleet manager understand
who's risking who's not see we want to
make sure that they can understand the
real context of what was going on for
the driver and then be able to provide
the right coaching advice at that moment
for that driver
